LGTM. Going to merge this now, but we'll have to remember to follow up and close the JIRA since JIRA is currently down, although I guess we have the remaining transformations to tackle still anyway.
LGTM!
Merged to trunk.
@ewencp for review
Thanks @ewencp for the thorough review!

Thanks for the review @gwenshap! I'm particularly interested in feedback regarding the user-visible docs. I tried to address your suggestion and made a few other minor tweaks in the docs for listeners, advertised.listeners and server.properties. Let me know if you have suggestions for improvement.

@dguy Is this still needed after #2338 is merged? In that case `ProcessorStateManager` will already know which stores are change-logging enabled so that the second parameter of `register(..)` is not needed at all.

The only remaining thing on my list is an integration test containing two listeners with the same security protocol. Working on that at the moment.
Thanks @enothereska, can we add a simple unit test? LGTM otherwise.

@guozhangwang  sorry for my git operation error  file "security.html" had not in my branch when you merged code.
now I had add to my branch.
 how to deal this?
another PR or could you  merge again?

thanks

@guozhangwang 
I don't know whether you understand my mistake.
Now what should I do about the file security.html , this file need to be committed also,but I leave it out 
in this PR 
Commit it again in new PR?
PR solves one problem, but seems there are others. Do not merge yet.
@hachikuji Can you take a look, please? Thank you.

retest this please

> Commit it again in new PR?

What I meant is that you can file another PR to get it merged.
I pushed an integration test and I am now happy with this PR. Please take a look @hachikuji and we can merge it once you're happy.
This is currently a commit on top of the docs for `sasl.jaas.config`. I will rebase after that is committed.
retest this please
@ijuma I added a simple check, still thinking of what more to add at this level since there is testing at the sensor level.
LGTM
